Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Provider \Pro*vid"er\, n. One who provides, furnishes, or supplies; one who procures what is wanted. [1913 Webster]
provider n 1: someone whose business is to supply a particular service or commodity [syn: {supplier}] 2: someone who provides the means for subsistence
